content: the drape of this scarf is divine when paired with the open weave of the flat granny stitch for me it is imperative that an infinity scarf be as squishy as possible i love them tall and plush and super comfortable i almost always go up one hook size than what is intended for the yarn to get every bit of squish factor i can this infinity scarf pattern checks off all those boxes find a tutorial for this stitch included in the pattern notes on hearthookhome com
